DOC.brief_summary: The safety and tolerability of two new artificial tears will be compared to a currently-available artificial tear in subjects with dry eye. Each subject will receive all three products in a randomly assigned order. The subject will use one product at a time for a duration of one week before switching to the next assigned product.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Artificial Tears in Dry Eye Subjects
DOC.criteria: Mild, moderate or severe symptoms of dry eye Uncontrolled systemic disease Contact lens wear Participation in another clinical study
